# v0.9.0 – Pre‑integration Stabilization

## Highlights
- Stable property filters and counts (9.1M–10.3M)
- Sales history display fixes for large datasets
- Appraiser links (BROWARD, MIAMI‑DADE) and county analysis groundwork
- Broad TypeScript/type integrity improvements

## Key Changes
- Filters/counts/sales: 7a1920a, fe06eae, e72ac50, 7f28efe
- Links/analysis: 4415728, 1617323, 681f23f
- TS fixes: d3bab62, 9c2e4f5, 7d5f3df (and others)
